snippet: HEELEY--Desmond, international set and costume designer for theater, opera, and ballet, passed away on Friday after a long illness. He was 85. A memorial will be scheduled at a future time. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HEELEY--Desmond, international set and costume designer for theater, opera, and ballet, passed away on Friday after a long illness. He was 85. A memorial will be scheduled at a future time. 1/3
